**Software Engineer at the Consumer Data Research Centre (CDRC), with over 5 years of experience programming in Python. PhD with published research papers in geographic information science and NLP.**

In my current role, I worked with [Llama Index](https://www.llamaindex.ai) and [LangChain](https://www.langchain.com) to build a Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) LLM-powered search system for the CDRC Data Catalogue. I am currently developing a data ingestion pipeline using [Prefect](https://www.prefect.io) to automate data checks, while building various data products, including a large-scale UK geocoded corpus from the [Common Crawl](https://www.commoncrawl.org).

Extensive experience with [PyTorch](https://www.pytorch.org) ([Lightning](https://www.lightning.ai)), [Hugging Face](https://www.huggingface.co) `transformers`, and the [OpenAI](https://www.openai.com) API. MLOps and reproducibility with [DVC](https://www.dvc.org), [Prefect](https://www.prefect.io), [GitHub Actions](https://www.docs.github.com/actions) and [Docker](https://www.docker.com)/[Podman](https://www.podman.io). Machine Learning and data processing with [Scikit-Learn](https://www.scikit-learn.org), [Pandas](https://www.pandas.pydata.org) and [Polars](https://www.pola.rs)^[My new favourite dataframe library.].
